code.description: Currency Code. Must be a valid ISO-4217 formatted currency code (3 uppercase letters).
code.title: Code

label.description: Custom label for the currency that will be displayed in the application. If not given, the default conventional label of the currency will be used (such as $, €, £, etc.). Length cannot exceed 5 characters.
label.title: Label

archived.description: Whether the currency is archived (not used anymore in the application) or not. Currency cannot be deleted for history purpose. Main currency cannot be archived.
archived.title: Archived

application_date.description: Application date of the event (YYYY-MM-DD) or literal 'first_event' for the first event of the timeline
application_date.title: Application Date

value.description: Value to apply for the event
value.title: Value
